resources.string:
Please input you data below.

 	Make sure to input it in a correct format or otherwise
 	the system cannot recognize your input.


The format:
 	X-Values:
 		LCL1-UCL1, LCL2-UCL2, LCL3-UCL3, ...
 		(note that the system uses the format ', ' for each x values to recognize the input.)


		* There must be a comma followed by a single space (, ) between each values of X and LCL, UCL are seperated only by dash (-).
 			Correct: LCL1-UCL1 (for example: 0-9, 10-19, 20-29)
 			Incorrect: LCL1 -UCL1,LCL2 - UCL2;LCL3- UCL3


	Y-Values:
 		f1, f2, f3, f4, ...
 		(note that the system uses the format ', ' y values to recognize the input)


		* There must only be a comma followed by a single space (, ) between each values of Y.
 			Correct: 1, 3, 2, 5
 			Incorrect: 1,3;2 ,5
Do you want to calculate Central Tendency or Variance?
